articles.title: China beats South Korea to win Women's Asian Cup - The Washington Post
articles.description: China came from two goals down to defeat South Korea 3-2 on Sunday and win the Women’s Asian Cup for a record ninth time
articles.content: At half-time I told the players not to give up as anything can happen in 45 minutes, said China coach Shui Qingxia, who won the title five times as a player. We are delighted to win the title and we … [+1536 chars]
